tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PreciousMetalsInvestments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metal_type VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    storage_location VARCHAR(100),
    current_market_value DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE PurchaseDetails (
  purchase_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  metal_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
  purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_details (
    purchase_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    metal_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    weight DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
    purchase_price DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE storage_information (
    storage_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_id INT REFERENCES purchase_details(purchase_id),
    storage_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    storage_cost DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    storage_start_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
    purchase_id INT,
    storage_id INT,
    market_id INT,
    investment_value DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (purchase_id) REFERENCES PurchaseDetails(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (storage_id) REFERENCES StorageInformation(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (market_id) REFERENCES MarketValues(id)
);

CREATE TABLE PreciousMetals (
    metal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metal_name VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    storage_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE StorageDetails (
    storage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metal_id INT,
    storage_type VARCHAR(255),
    stored_quantity INT,
    storage_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentHistory (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_id INT,
    metal_id INT,
    investment_date DATE,
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);
